Title: Provides an exemption to the prohibition on tinted windows in automobiles for emergency ambulance service vehicles
Summary: Provides an exemption to the prohibition on tinted windows in automobiles for emergency ambulance service vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง375, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to providing an exemption to the prohibition on tinted windows in automobiles for emergency ambulance service vehicles
